Package com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.bluetooth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BluetoothClient.ListenerAutoConnect  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothAdHocDevice
    This class represents a remote Bluetooth-enabled device.
    BluetoothAdHocManager
    This class manages the Bluetooth discovery and the pairing with other bluetooth devices.
    BluetoothClient
    This class defines the client's logic for bluetooth implementation.
    BluetoothServer
    This class defines the server's logic for bluetooth implementation.
    BluetoothUtil
    This class allows to get the current name and the current MAC address of the bluetoothAdapter, and defines the common UUID.
